verbs.description: [ARG1: statue of edison steinmetz] [V: unveiled] [ARGM-LOC: in schenectady] [ARGM-LOC: a stiff wind] unveiled a statue friday morning that depicts general electric founder thomas edison and ge scientist charles steinmetz the wind exposed the bronze of the two men before officials could drop the cloth covering the statue was installed at the intersection of erie boulevard and south ferry street in schenectady a location that is just blocks from ge downtown plant edison and steinmetz teamed up to lead general electric spectacular growth in schenectady a century ago edison schenectady new york museum of innovation and science thomas edison steinmetz st louis
